text: @realDonaldTrump You do know that the flu is not a pandemic? You do know that the flu has a vaccine? Nope..still spinning lies and BS to boost your ego. You are a fool and you are going to fall flat .. unfortunately more people will die by the 10’s of thousands. You are Unfit for office. #Trump
